item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Michael Healy, and I am a 2nd year PhD student at Florida State University. I am interested in the overlaps between creative writing and composition, invention and creativitiy, and how people use, navigate, and are shaped by the tools digital tools and networks they encounter.
